meanings.sent1: The toy car may semple fast to the child.
meanings.sent2: She sembles happy when she plays with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat sembles to be a ninja when it stalks its prey.
meanings.sent4: The old house sembles a haunted mansion in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds sembled a dark army ready to attack.

meanings.definition: To give the impression of being
meanings.sent1: His smile sembles kindness to everyone he meets.
meanings.sent2: The actor sembles a brave knight in the play.
meanings.sent3: The broken clock sembles a grumpy old man who refuses to work.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sembles a gentle breeze on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The painting sembles a window into a magical world.

meanings.sent1: The new puppy sembles its mother in many ways.
meanings.sent2: The flower sembles a tiny sun with its bright yellow petals.
meanings.sent3: The cloud sembles a fluffy pillow floating in the sky.
meanings.sent4: His handwriting sembles a spider dancing across the page.
meanings.sent5: The mountain sembles a sleeping giant under the blue sky.
